verses.roman:
bhūmete paḍilā rāya nāhika cetana
rāye kole kari' prabhu karaye krandana

synonyms: bhūmete paḍilā—fell down on the ground; rāya—Rāmānanda Rāya; nāhika cetana—there was no consciousness; rāye—Rāmānanda Rāya; kole kari'-taking on the lap; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karaye krandana—began crying.
translation: When Rāmānanda Rāya fell to the ground and lost consciousness, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu took him upon His lap and began to cry.
